name: redux-observable
description: RxJS based middleware for Redux. Compose and cancel async actions and more.

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run build:tests && mocha temp && npm run test:typings
scripts.test:typings: typings install && tsc index.d.ts typings/index.d.ts test/typings.ts --outDir temp --target ES5 --moduleResolution node && cd temp && node typings.js
scripts.shipit: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run lint && npm test && scripts/preprepublish.sh && npm publish
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g redux-observable/redux-observable && cp logo/favicon.ico _book/gitbook/images
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:redux-observable/redux-observable gh-pages --force
